info.description: API service for digital attendance system with role-based access control.
info.title: Digital Attendance API

post.description: Create a new user with role and optional supervisor

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can create users

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users who are not administrators

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can view user list

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available roles in the system

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can view roles

post.description: Create a new role in the system

400.description: Validation error or role already exists

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can create roles

get.description: Get a list of all admin roles in the system

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can view roles

get.description: Get a list of all non-admin roles in the system

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can view roles
Forbidden - Only admins can update roles

400.description: Role is in use by users

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can delete roles

get.description: Get a list of all users who report to the current user
Get detailed information about a specific user

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can update users

delete.description: Delete an existing user from the system

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can delete users

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

400.description: Invalid request payload or validation error

post.description: Record user's check-in with photo and location. Location must be within defined radius of office coordinates.

400.description: Invalid request, location too far from office, or invalid photo

post.description: Record user's check-out with photo and location

400.description: Invalid request, location too far, or invalid photo

get.description: Retrieve all attendance records for the current user
Retrieve attendance records for all subordinates (supervisor only)

put.description: Update attendance record for a subordinate (supervisor only)

post.description: Submit a new leave request with supporting documentation

parameters.description: Supporting document (JPG, JPEG, PNG, PDF, max 5MB)
parameters.name: attachment

400.description: Invalid request payload, dates, or attachment

get.description: Get all leave requests submitted by the current user
Get all leave requests submitted by users who report to the current user

put.description: Approve or reject a leave request as a supervisor

404.description: Leave request or user not found

get.description: Get the profile of the currently authenticated user (non-admin)

id.description: The unique identifier for the attendance record

photoURL.description: URL of the photo taken during attendance

updated_at.description: When the record was last updated

user_id.description: The user ID who created the attendance record

validationStatus.description: Status of the validation (PRESENT, ABSENT, LATE)

status.description: Status to set for the leave request (APPROVED, REJECTED)
